channel.title: General Lore on Age of Sigmar Lore
channel.description: Recent content in General Lore on Age of Sigmar Lore

item.title: The Story so Far
item.description: For everyone who wants to understand what’s going on in the Age of Sigmar Lore! A half hour video which summarizes the general idea A 2 hour video which goes into detail about the world itself A Warhammer Community post which briefly explains the world of the Mortal Realms

item.title: Dawn Bringers
item.description: Dawnbringser crusade lore: The largest foothold of humanity in the mortal realms spread across the realms of life and fire Hammerhall lore Nurgle attacks hammerhall with plague (start of book one) what happens in aqsha side during part 1 The scale of the crusade The cities of sigmar show More cities Realm of life crusade continue (tornus is here) also ironjaws with pigs! Casual gardus chad moment book 3 prologue
